name: .SNIBB File Extension
summary: Learn about .SNIBB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A SNIBB file is an audio module created by Snibbetracker, a music tracker developed for creating and playing digital music. It contains the patterns, notes, instrument data, volume levels, and timing information that make up a music composition created in Snibbetracker. SNIBB files allow musicians to build detailed, sample-based music that can be played back using the same samples and settings every time.

content: Harry Lundström developed Snibbetracker, a simple music sequencer for Windows and macOS, that allows users to arrange musical patterns and samples in a grid-like interface. Hobbyist musicians, retro computing enthusiasts, and digital music creators working with Snibbetracker are the most likely to encounter SNIBB files. When composing, they can save their progress as a SNIBB module by pressing the control + s keys.

instructions: You can open SNIBB files with Snibbetracker in Windows and macOS. To open a SNIBB file, press the control + o keys.

Since SNIBB files are saved in plain text, you can also open them with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad and Apple TextEdit. However, incorrectly modifying SNIBB files with a text editor will break them, and they will not be playable in Snibbetracker.
Snibbetracker can convert SNIBB files to .WAV files. To do so, press the control + e keys.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
